details.text: The profile StructureDefinition[http://hl7.org.au/fhir/test/StructureDefinition/xhtml-ctrol-source-profile] requires a section in the narrative for the resource language (en), but it was not found (found de, pt)
Resource has a language (en), and the XHTML has a lang (pt), but they differ
Resource has a language (en), and the XHTML has an xml:lang (pt), but they differ
